name: v_dot_product
description: Calculates the dot product between two dense_vectors.

params.name: left
params.description: first dense_vector to calculate dot product similarity

params.name: right
params.description: second dense_vector to calculate dot product similarity

examples:
from colors
| eval similarity = v_dot_product(rgb_vector, [0, 255, 255])
| sort similarity desc, color asc
